projects.title: Javascript Calculator
projects.description: I took FreeCodeCamp Front End Development Libraries Projects to improve my front end skills. With this project I wanted to use my React skills to build a functioning calculator. The react app was styled with CSS.

projects.title: Recipe Box
projects.description: I took FreeCodeCamp Front End Development Libraries Projects to improve my front end skills. With this project I used React and gained a better insight into local storage to save recipes.
